0.1.name: wordpress/storenvy
0.1.description:
This is a plugin for getting items from a Storenvy shop and displaying them. It gets the info from the 'products.json' feed, so only information that's in the feed can be pulled in to your page/post. The plugin allows you to configure how the info is displayed.

The plugin has not been tested with anything prior to WordPress 3.0 (at least not recently)

Supports shorcodes and template tags.
